title: CRUD - Resenha Filme
information: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.
problem: Customers needed a reliable and fast platform to buy and manage their products online, with secure payment integration.
solution: Built a scalable e-commerce solution using React for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, and MongoDB for the database. Integrated with Stripe for secure payments.

title: BLACK - BarberShop
problem: Needed a digital platform to present my work and attract potential clients or employers.
solution: Designed and developed a responsive, user-friendly portfolio website using React and Tailwind CSS. Optimized for performance and accessibility.

title: Gym 4Girls
information: A simple and intuitive task management app for users to create, edit, and track their daily tasks.
problem: Users needed a way to efficiently organize and manage tasks with real-time updates and cross-device synchronization.
solution: Developed a responsive task management app using Vue.js and Firebase for real-time database functionality and user authentication.
